captions.text: "What we’ve been through together makes me feel sure that she is the one "
"I want to spend the rest of my life with."
"What we’ve been through together, I’m not sure if it’s love or just familiarity."
"I’m not sure if he is my true love, my soul mate."
"I…I don’t get it. Eight years together, that’s not enough to call it love?"
You’re my everything in my dream and real life,
Exactly as I desire,
You’re the taleI regaleand get lost in my dream.
You are my heart. Nobody will ever be compared.
Lucky I’ve found you, been in love with you, and had you by my side.
You would be the one who can stop time as you look me in the eyes.
You would be the one who can stop this poor heart when it’s lost, now with you.
You are the one. All I wanted is you.
I will try every way with my heart and my soul.
That is to love you. Anytime, anywhere, I don’t care.
All I care ‘bout is you, only you.
You’re my real thing. I’m willing to sacrifice for you.
We’re destined to meet, for us to be in love, for us to hold hands as one from this day.
You would be the one who can stop time as you look me in the eyes.
You would be the one who can stop this poor heart when it’s lost, now with you.
You are the one. All I wanted is you.
I will try every way with my heart and my soul.
That is to love you. Anytime, anywhere, I don’t care
All I care ‘bout is you, only...
[pic] "You are as drunk as a skunk. Eat this congee and be a man."
You are the one. All I hoped for is you.                        [pic] "You are as drunk as a skunk. Eat this congee and be a man."
On my knees, make a wish to the gods in the skies
That is to love you. Anytime, anywhere, I don’t care.
All I care ‘bout is you, only you.
"Since that day, I’ve never heard anything from her."
"It’s not our past that matters."
"It’s what will happen in the future that matters."
"I think we should have a distance for a while."
"Or should we really break up?"
Hard times or even when you’re happy
When you’re weak or you’re strong and healthy
I’m right here, all the time with you. Don’t you worry.
I’ll be right by your side. I’ll be here, me always by your side…
"I cannot forget her."
"I will go back to her."
You are the one. All I wanted is you.
I will try every way with my heart and my soul.
That is to love you. Anytime, anywhere, I don’t care.
"Actually, I miss him so much."
All I care ‘bout is you, only...
You are the one. And it’s you I’ve waited for.
I sit on my knees, making a wish from the skies.
That is to love you. Anywhere, anytime, I don’t mind.
Every life, I’ll love you….all my heart…and soul….
"All these times are the test. It the test that makes us realize how much we love each other."
"No matter what the future may bring, I will love her, because she is my true soul mate."

title: คู่ชีวิต - COCKTAIL「Official MV (English subs)」
